content: The `Class.StyleRule:SetProperty()` function now automatically handles the following color type conversions: A) converts a `Datatype.BrickColor` value to a `Datatype.Color3` when setting a `Datatype.Color3` property; B) converts a `Datatype.Color3` value to a `Datatype.ColorSequence` when setting a `Datatype.ColorSequence` property.
Fixes an issue where, when setting `Class.HapticEffect` to `Enum.HapticEffectType.Custom|Custom` type, the waveform data is not correctly replicated from server to client.
Autocomplete now suggests hot comments, also known as [comment directives](/luau/comments#comment-directives).
In the Explorer, double-clicking to expand will now use the system's double-click speed.

Adds `Class.UIDragDetector.ActivatedCursorIconContent`, `Class.UIDragDetector.CursorIconContent`, `Class.UserInputService.MouseIconContent`, `Class.ClickDetector.CursorIconContent`, `Class.DragDetector.ActivatedCursorIconContent`, `Class.Mouse.IconContent`, and `Class.BackpackItem.TextureContent` properties.
In Luau's New Type Solver, fixes an instance of getting an erroneous "Type inference has failed to complete" error when using user defined type functions.
Adds `Class.SoundService.AudioPlayerVolumeFix` to rollout a fix for an issue with `Class.AudioPlayer|AudioPlayers` not playing at the correct volume.
Introduces a new property `Class.Workspace.AirTurbulenceIntensity` that controls the strength of turbulence present in the wind velocity field, affecting the aerodynamic force model.
`Global.LuaGlobals.rawget()` now returns `nil` when queried key isn't present.
Ensures the order of speech-to-text responses matches the spoken order even with different server latencies per event. Drops responses that time out.
In Luau's New Type Solver, better handles intersections of tables when checking for table literal type mismatches.
Fixes an issue where certain scripts could cause script analysis to fail.
Fixes `Class.ScrollingFrame` scrollbar rendering issues with `Class.UICorner`.
Fixes possible false occlusion from inactivated terrain meshes.
Scripts cloned while in edit mode no longer have synchronized breakpoints.
Fixes `Class.ImageLabel.SliceCenter` warnings when using negative `Class.ImageLabel.ImageRectSize`.
Fixes a bug in Luau typechecking that could cause autocomplete to not provide suggestions when invoked near the length/unary minus operator.
In Luau's New Type Solver, autocomplete now more accurately tracks refinement information when nesting multiple refinements.
Fixes a crash on typing an invalid `@[deprecated]` attribute.
Addresses a crash from using the constraint scale slider in the "Visualization Modes" panel on some Windows machines.
Fixes bug in the Explorer where nesting many `Class.Folder|Folders` and trying to open the "insert object" menu on the lowest one will hang Studio.
Fixes bug in the Explorer where, if the mouse's left and right buttons are swapped in system settings on Windows, drags in the Explorer won't work.
